entry.title: Photos Post 13: Moments of Growth, New Albums and Galleries, Part 23

link.title: Photos Post 13: Moments of Growth, New Albums and Galleries, Part 23

entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to bring to your attention one new folder (with 1 album/gallery to begin with):
1. Photographic Art of an Artist.
Please kindly share the news and the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam

entry.title: Photos Post 33: Egypt
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 24 Photos from 1996-1029 Talk to Sahaja Yogis, Cairo, Egypt, the very first Photos from Egypt, have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 24 high resolutions from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the 24 Photos in the smallest gallery: Egypt 1996.
Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam

entry.title: Photos Post 15: Monthly Pūjās Updates, June 2024

link.title: Photos Post 15: Monthly Pūjās Updates, June 2024

entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

This month 59 new Photos were uploaded to 7 Pūjas as follows (56 high resolutions and 3 medium resolutions).
(i) 1986-1005 Śhrī Gaurī Pūjā: 1 high resolution uploaded, link India 1986.
(ii) 1993-1010 Śhrī Virāṭa Virāṭaṅganā Pūjā: 1 medium resolution uploaded, link U.S.A. 1993.
(iii) 1995-1008 Śhrī Śhakti Devī Pūjā: 2 medium resolutions uploaded, link U.S.A. 1995.
(iv) 1996-0901 Śhrī Kṛiṣhṇa Pūjā: 24 high resolutions uploaded, link Italy 1996.
(v) 1996-0915 Śhrī Gaṇeśha Pūjā: 19 high resolutions uploaded, link Italy 1996.
(vi) 1996-1020 Navarātri Pūjā: 11 high resolutions uploaded, link Italy 1996.
(vii) 2000-0305 Śhivarātri Pūjā: 1 high resolution uploaded, link India 2000.
Please kindly share the news and the links with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam

entry.title: Photos Post 29: Special Events (after 1975), Part 78
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 4 Photos of the special event 1995-1229 Marriages Ceremony, India have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 2 high resolutions and 2 medium resolutions from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the 4 Photos in the smallest gallery: India 1995.
The event has as well 3 photos Moments of Joy which can be seen in the smallest gallery at the link Collection Moments of Joy.
[Note: the 2 high resolutions uploaded on 2024-0619.] Please kindly share the links with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam
